articles.title: Will Trump's Tariff War Draw A United BRICS Response? What We Know So Far
articles.description: US President Donald Trump imposed 50% tariffs on Brazil and India, prompting Brazilian President Lula to call for a joint BRICS response.

articles.title: Modi and Putin Reaffirm Strategic Partnership Amidst US Tariff Hike
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Russian President Vladimir Putin discussed deepening their strategic partnership amid US tariff pressures. Modi reiterated India's stance on peaceful conflict resolution. Meanwhile, an additional 25% US tariff on Indian purchases of Russian oil heightens tensions, impacting both India and Brazil's trade relations with the US.
articles.content: In a critical dialogue, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi engaged with Russian President Vladimir Putin, reinforcing their commitment to the India-Russia Special and Privileged Strategic Partnership. The call underscored ongoing bilateral cooperati... [822 chars]

articles.title: Brazil economy starting to see impact of high rates, official says
articles.description: Brazil's government believes the economy is starting to feel the effects of high interest rates and will closely monitor data to see if those impacts are "wider than initially expected," Economic Policy Secretary Guilherme Mello said on Friday.
